metadata.title: CVE-2014-3575 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The OLE preview generation in Apache OpenOffice before 4.1.1 andOpenOffice.org (OOo) might allow remote attackers to embed arbitrary datainto documents via crafted OLE objects.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

browser-plugin-libreoffice - 1:4.2.6.3-0ubuntu1
libreoffice - 1:4.2.6.3-0ubuntu1
libreoffice-avmedia-backend-gstreamer - 1:4.2.6.3-0ubuntu1
libreoffice-base - 1:4.2.6.3-0ubuntu1
